(:action collect
  ; Collect a resource and update the state of the entity involved
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?resource - entity ?container - entity)
  :precondition (and
                  (in_location ?actor ?resource_location)
                  (empty ?container))
  :effect (and
            (collected ?actor ?resource ?container)
            (not (empty ?container))

(:action get ; Retrieve a resource or achieve a state
    :parameters (?actor - entity ?resource - object ?location - place)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?actor ?location)
        (or 
            (and (has_tool ?actor ?resource) (location ?location riverside))
            (not (achieved ?actor ?resource))
        )
    )
    :effect (and 
        (achieved ?actor ?resource)
        (or 
            (lost ?actor)
            (has_fish ?actor)
            (resource_obtained ?actor)
        )

(:action cover ; Cover a resource and update its status
    :parameters (?actor - entity ?location - place ?resource - item)
    :precondition (and
                    (at ?actor ?location)
                    (prepared ?location)
                    (not (covered ?resource))
                  )
    :effect (covered ?resource)
)
